ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hot Key to Re-target Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t you run into trouble using this sequence on the retargetting the pet when the charm breaks early? Speaking of which, last night I had charm and fear
ygData.messageBody:
Don't you run into trouble using this sequence on the retargetting the pet
when the charm breaks early?

Speaking of which, last night I had charm and fear breaking immediatley
after the "glaze" and "flees" messages a lot last night. Has anyone else
noticed this? There also seems to have been a lot more "missed notes" than
usual.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 1:40 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hot Key to Re-target Pet


Not that I know of, I have my fingers set to twitch:
2(charm)
6 assist hotkey
1,1 (some song, usually buff song)
3,3 (other song)
f1,f1
pause
2,2
